content.description: Start with your left hand on an obvious low flake sidepull (this hold might break so be careful) and your right hand on a sidepull about eye level on the other side of the arete. It is easiest to start with a high foot inline with your left hand, but lower feet are possible for taller climbers. Bust one semi big move to the lip and do a semi-awkward top out.
content.protection: One or two pads should be more than enough. CAUTION: this climb is right next to the road, a spotter is useful for making sure you don't fall into the road or to spot cars.
content.location: Park for Rainbow main by the Loch Leven trailhead. The boulder is directly across from the parking lot. The exact location is N 39.3117018 , W 120.5118966.
